Key Match Events: Pete Alonso launched another homer off Aaron Nola
Starling Marte had a pivotal two-run single
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets have never had a clinching celebration at Citi Field, which opened in 2009
Others: Aaron Nola is relieved by manager Rob Thomson during the sixth inning
Tyrone Taylor’s terrific throw from deep center field that cut down a runner at second base in the fourth
Manaea was lifted after allowing an infield single to start the eighth
Clinging to a 2-0 lead, Manaea escaped major trouble in the sixth
Nick Castellanos then lined into an inning-ending double play
Alonso sent Nola’s first pitch of the second deep to right field
Nola and Alonso have been squaring off since their college days in the Southeastern Conference
It was Alonso’s sixth career homer off the right-hander
Thomson left Nola on the mound in the sixth to face Alonso
Aaron Nola is relieved by manager Rob Thomson during the sixth inning
Game 4 is Wednesday at Citi Field, with All-Star Ranger Suárez scheduled to start for Philadelphia against fellow lefty José Quintana
